name: places/ChIJs0G4mL1ZwokRv4maWJztgn4
formattedAddress: 138 W 15th St #1, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 138 W 15th St #1, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: I've been seeing Shoko for a year now to help with several musculoskeletal issues I have. I just so happened to find her as I live on the same street, which is a convenient location near the West Village, Chelsea & Union Square. Shoko is not only an amazing massage therapist, but she is also a lovely person who is kind, caring & knows a lot about her craft. Her studio is so calming, but my favorite part about our sessions is picking the essential oils. She has vast knowledge about aromatherapy & has several oils to choose from. I use Rose Centifolia & I leave smelling amazing. That experience is really special because she makes it so personal & specific to you. Highly recommend her services.

text.text: I've been seeing Shoko for a year now to help with several musculoskeletal issues I have. Shoko is not only an amazing massage therapist, but she is also a lovely person who is kind, caring & knows a lot about her craft. Her studio is so calming, but my favorite part about our sessions is picking the essential oils. She has vast knowledge about aromatherapy & has several oils to choose from. I use Rose Centifolia & I leave smelling amazing. That experience is really special because she makes it so personal & specific to you. Highly recommend her services.

originalText.text:
Shoko is magician!! I could tell her massage practice was special from the moment I stepped into her office for the first time. She is warm, caring and thoughtful, and really takes the time to understand her patients, talk through problems and even works with you to design a custom essential oil mix for your treatment.

Her treatments are holistic, thorough, and attentive. I always leave feeling a million times better!! Shoko is a true master of her craft — I’ve already recommended her to a number of close friends :) thank you Shoko!

originalText.text: Shoko is wonderful! I have been working with her every other week for months, and I always feel relaxed and revived after her massages. She is especially talented a prenatal massage, which has been a huge benefit during my pregnancy. I highly recommend her

text.text: Shoko is wonderful! I have been working with her every other week for months, and I always feel relaxed and revived after her massages. She is especially talented a prenatal massage, which has been a huge benefit during my pregnancy. I highly recommend her

originalText.text: As a wellness professional I can appreciate the expert application Shoko applies through her understanding of highly effective massage techniques, human anatomy, and treatment. She goes above and beyond to understand each individual person in order to get your body into a state of rejuvenation and recovery. Glad I was recommended her services and have given recommendations to friends and family.

originalText.text: I first started being treated by Shoko 7 years ago.   She has a strong understanding of anatomy and kinesiology with a plethora of different modalities studied over time.  Her hands are intuitive and can adjust pressure as needed.   Highly recommend Her as a therapist.
